headline: Assessing Intercontinental Exchange (ICE) Valuation After Sustained Shareholder Returns And A 31x P/E Multiple
summary: Why Intercontinental Exchange matters for investors right now Intercontinental Exchange (ICE) runs trading, clearing, data, and mortgage technology platforms across major financial markets, generating revenue of about US$9.75b and net income of roughly US$3.16b across its three core segments. See our latest analysis for Intercontinental Exchange. At a share price of US$171.90, ICE has posted a 6.47% 1 month share price return and a 9.18% 3 month share price return. Its 1 year total...
